attributes.action: Change the policy on pensions and make them tax free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pensioners have, for far to long, suffered the pain of an income that barely gets them by.
The time has come for the government tot do the right thing and make all pensions tax free.
When we pay into a pension scheme, the money that we earn is taxed first and then we pay into, if we choose, a pension scheme.  Is it fair for the people of this country to be taxed twice on the same income?
Times have changed and with the figure of pensioners to working age people ration being on the rise it effectively means more and more people will have to suffer as a result.
